6806.TWO.summary: Shinfox Energy International Inc. engages in oil trading business. The company is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

8908.TWO.summary: ShinHsiung Natural Gas Inc. supplies natural gas in Taiwan. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.

8931.TWO.summary: Ta-Yuan Cogeneration Company Ltd. generates and supplies electricity and heat to Dayuan industrial park in Taiwan. It operates and manages cogeneration plants. The company also engages in operating and repairing equipment, processing waste disposal, managing incinerators, producing petrochemical materials, and processing refuse derived fuel. Ta-Yuan Cogeneration Company Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

9908.TW.summary: The Great Taipei Gas Corporation supplies natural gas in Taiwan. The company's business area covers seven districts, including Song-Shan, Sin-Yi, Da-An, Da-Tong, Manka, Zhong-Zheng, and Zhong-Shan, as well as two counties comprising Fu-Hua and Ming-Sheng in the Su-Lim district. It serves approximately 380,000 customers. The company was founded in 1964 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
